idea-plugin.name: Spring Batch Monitor
idea-plugin.description:
Spring Batch Monitor Plugin for IntelliJ IDEA provides a convenient way to monitor and manage Spring Batch jobs directly from your IDE.

This plugin connects directly to your Spring Batch database and provides comprehensive monitoring capabilities without requiring additional backend services.

âœ¨ Key Features:

  • Multi-Database Support - MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle, SQL Server, H2
  • Job Execution Monitoring - View complete job execution history with detailed information
  • Step-Level Analysis - Analyze individual step executions with comprehensive statistics
  • Advanced Search & Filtering - Search by job name, status, time range, and keywords
  • Real-time Configuration - Dynamic data source management with instant updates
  • Chinese Interface - Fully localized Chinese user interface
  • Statistical Reports - Job success rates, execution trends, and performance metrics

ðŸš€ Quick Start:

  1. Install the plugin and restart IntelliJ IDEA
  2. Open the Spring Batch Monitor tool window
  3. Configure your Spring Batch database connection
  4. Start monitoring your batch jobs!

ðŸ“‹ Requirements:

  • IntelliJ IDEA 2022.* or later (Community/Ultimate Edition)
  • Access to Spring Batch metadata tables (BATCH_JOB_EXECUTION, BATCH_STEP_EXECUTION, etc.)
  • Java 11 or later

No additional backend services required! The plugin connects directly to your database.
